text:
Hello. I can see that <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/owners/> gives me "updatedAt" for when an owner updates his details.
I would like to get the Last Active timestamp for owners, which is displayed in the UI. Is there any way of getting that through API calls?

Thanks for the response <@U25C65C3S>. I don't see how to filter by a property in the documentation though. These are the docs I've been using: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/tickets?_ga=2.68391313.163160571.1643045219-1499513832.1642790769>
how am I able to find a contactID using the v3 api, in order to delete a contact I need to specify a contactID but it isn’t returned from getting the contacts info with the api

I rolled back my migration for the granular scope migration process and now I receive this error when I try to retry the process: "Something Went Wrong. Please retry later or contact support" Does anyone know what to do to fix this error?

Hi there. I'm setting up the integration for the first time and I don't understand why the request is not valid. How to find the error?

code: 'invalid_json', message: 'The response is not a valid JSON response.'
